title: minecraft:wearable
description: Wearable items can be worn by a player in the head, chest, legs, feet, or off-hand slots.

protection.description: How much protection the wearable item provides. Default is set to 0.

slot.title: EquipmentSlot
slot.description: Specifies where the item can be worn. If any non-hand slot is chosen, the max stack size is set to 1.
